Yes, I did use your character, Carnage. And I'm sorry.
You see, you do such a good with your characters the I just wanted to try one out. I wouldn't touch Dinobot, you do too good of a job with him. But I just wanted to try one out. I know that this'll be a mark against me and I'm sorry. I'll ask you next time. (Not to mention that I'm half asleep right now.But that's no real excuse.)
And I apologize to all of the NBWers out there about the last post I sent, do what Carnage said and just delete it. I'm sorry, again.
I'll post my own character now.

                                   I.R.
